author: Doug Bostrom
content:
Turns out this guy wasted nearly a quarter million dollars on flying to Guam to fall on his face.

Does a crew like a lousy skipper? No. Was Crozier earning favor by fraternizing with crew? No.

Crowd wisdom of crew: respect it.

author: Doug Bostrom
content: Keeping character with his boss, where the buck bounces off. D

author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: And thus, once again, it has been proven that serving Trump is a risky business.

author: Willy
content:
So, what of the Captain?
Will he get reinstated because of Modly’s tampering?

author: Richard Roth
content: I just read that he has resigned his post in order to spend more time with his family. Adios Muchacho

author: Peter Wright
content: I don’t know about strawberries but he certainly collected a lot of raspberries. I do note that Thomas B. Modly has the same hairdresser as Mr. Trump.

author: Richard Roth
content: Did he try to find out who ate the strawberries while he was there?

author: Peter Wright
content: The beatings will continue until morale improves.
